job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop, test and deploy well-architected software
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes traditional software engineering activities related to the full software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: practice a range of disciplines: back-end, front-end, networking, DevOps, machine learning, data science, data architecture.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates the role involves a broad spectrum of software engineering practices, including integration of various disciplines.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with customers through full engagements; you'll learn about their business challenges, rapidly design and develop prototypes to solve them, showcase the functionality you've written in demos and finally see the difference you've made when customers deploy solutions into their production environments.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end process of taking a customer's problem, developing a solution (prototype), and seeing it through to deployment, which is a core software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with the latest AWS services and open-source technologies to build your prototypes.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the development aspect using specific technologies, fitting under software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: The code we write provides immediate value for customers by showing how technology can solve their problems.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the outcome of the software development work, which is solving customer problems.

job_tasks.phrase: work on our customer's challenges that don't have cookie-cutter solutions. We work with the latest 5G and GenAI technologies
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the application of GenAI technologies to solve specific customer challenges, implying model usage or development.

job_tasks.phrase: are expected to Dive Deep to figure out the best approach.
job_tasks.justification: This suggests a problem-solving approach that likely involves understanding and applying AI/ML techniques to find solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with customers through full engagements; you'll learn about their business challenges, rapidly design and develop prototypes to solve them, showcase the functionality you've written in demos
soft_skills.justification: This describes direct interaction with customers, understanding their needs, and presenting developed solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: practice a range of disciplines: back-end, front-end, networking, DevOps, machine learning, data science, data architecture. We are curious generalists who don't pigeon-hole ourselves as particular "flavors" of engineer and never say "that's not my job".
soft_skills.justification: This highlights a broad curiosity and willingness to engage with diverse technical areas, indicating a strong learning and adaptability trait.

soft_skills.phrase: work on our customer's challenges that don't have cookie-cutter solutions.
soft_skills.justification: This points to dealing with complex, non-standard problems that require tailored solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: are expected to Dive Deep to figure out the best approach.
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes a deep-dive, analytical approach to problem-solving to determine the optimal method.

soft_skills.phrase: rapidly design and develop prototypes to solve them
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on rapid prototyping to solve problems suggests an innovative and proactive approach to development.

profile.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes traditional software development tasks (design, develop, test, deploy, back-end, front-end, networking, DevOps) which fall under Macro-Category A. While it mentions working with 'GenAI technologies' and 'machine learning', these are presented as tools or areas to explore within the broader context of building prototypes and solving customer challenges, rather than the primary focus of model development or specialization. The role is about integrating and applying these technologies into software solutions, fitting the description of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines a strong software engineering foundation with an inclusion of AI/ML technologies. The emphasis is on building and prototyping solutions for customer challenges using a variety of tools, including GenAI. The profile assignment is straightforward based on this balance. A slightly lower score is given because the specific tasks within GenAI are not detailed, leaving some room for interpretation on the depth of AI involvement.
